name: Sunfighter
description:
Made in two weeks for LowRezJam2022 making use of the themes The Sun Is Your Enemy and You Are the Last Hope.

It's, well, a bit buggy still with some of the enemy behavior, but I don't think there should be anything game breaking. There's even a new game plus mode that was almost entirely accidental!

Thanks to Darenn Keller for the Godot splash screen and font recommendation from this excellent tutorial for making low rez games in Godot.

Controls for keyboard:

  • WASD: Move and crouch
  • SPACE: Jump
  • J: Attack (also Upgrade health)
  • K: Run (also Upgrade Stamina)
  • L: Block (also Upgrade Resistance)
  • I: Take item
  • P: Pause

Xbox 360/One controllers should work as well, and possibly others, but I could only test it with a One controller. Though all the controls in-game will still only be listed for the keyboard. Controls for Xbox:

  • LEFT STICK/D-PAD: Move and crouch
  • A: Jump
  • X: Attack (also Upgrade health)
  • B: Run (also Upgrade Stamina)
  • LB/RB: Block (also Upgrade Resistance)
  • Y: Take item
  • START/OPTIONS: Pause
